 Undergraduate admissions 
 BUILD YOUR FUTURE SELF AT CONCORDIA Your university years are a time to invest in - and shape - your future self.  Take an important first step: Find your program 
 Start your journey, today! 
 1.  CHOOSE A PROGRAM 
 2.  REVIEW THE REQUIREMENTS 
 3.  APPLY 
 4.  AFTER YOU'VE APPLIED 
 NEW STUDENTS: PREPARE FOR FIRST YEAR 
 Amazing spaces Find spaces for in-depth learning and knowledge creation. Learn more 
 Concordia lifestyle Your student life begins here – an urban lifestyle where you can balance academics with an active social life through sports, arts, culture and more. Learn more 
 Residences Take a tour of our residences and get settled in your new home away from home. Learn more 
 International students Montreal ranks as the best student city in the world. See why students from over 150 countries come to Concordia. Learn more 
 Hands-on learning Bridge university life and work world with  co-op  programs. Learn more 
 Study abroad Spend a semester or a year studying in another country – take courses at one of our partner universities at Concordia tuition rates. Learn more 
 Life in Montreal Montreal is the perfect place to learn, study and experience living in a multicultural environment. Learn more 
 Student profiles Students often have the best advice. Listen to their best Concordia stories and see why they continue to inspire us every day. Learn more
